name: Stella Brown and the Curse of the Grocery Witch
name_original: Stella Brown and the Curse of the Grocery Witch
description:
Stella Brown and the Curse of the Grocery Witch

It was just an ordinary day at the grocery store...

Note: the web version has some audio issues. For the best sonic experience, download a standalone build.

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51! The theme was "every ten seconds."

Code
Jimmy Cushnie — jimmycushnie.com
Zoey Duthie

Art
Issa (art director) — artstation.com/izamatrix
Linka — instagram.com/linkaguo
Keyna — instagram.com/gkeyna

Music
Lauren Pham — laurenpham.bandcamp.com
Markku Wainman — markkuwainman.com

Starring Lauren as Stella Brown and Zoey as The Grocery Witch!

This game uses the font "Unique" by Luluk Surotul.
